content: we re falling into fall with a chunky granny square scarf crocheted in our non-superwash 100% corriedale wool yarn cardo 1 the retro cardo scarf uses 4 colors of cardo in one skein apiece bottle dark green gecko light green spirulina acid yellow and goldenrod golden yellow a clever joining method neatly brings the squares together paired with a single_crochet border around the whole scarf the finished piece is quite elegant ///// size 76 x 6½ materials manos del uruguay cardo 100% corriedale wool approx 109 yds/100g 1 skein each of 4 colors shown in d2300 bottle mc d2295 gecko cc1 d2020 spirulina cc2 and d2221 goldenrod cc3 us k/6 5mm hook or size to obtain gauge tapestry needle gauge 1 square = 6 x 6 1 https //fairmountfibers com/collections/yarns/products/cardo
